title: Research impact - Living in community settings (The University of Kent)
text: ( Source : The University of Kent ) Pioneering research at Kent by the late Jim Mansell and Professor Julie Beadle-Brown has shown that small-scale, dispersed community settings provide the best quality of life for people with intellectual and
